title: Can't login to PBE
body: It's giving me the whole "incorrect user or password" message, but I tried resetting my password to try fix it but no luck. PBE signups says I already have a PBE acc so I'm just a little lost on what to do from now on {{champion:32}}

replies.body: It could be that your PBE account has been compromised! Submitting a ticket to us for an [account recovery ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)will help us find and get back that account for you.

You can open a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and ask them to help you recover your PBE account. Be sure to explicitly say that it is the PBE account you need or they might mistakenly think it's your live account you need back.

Good luck!
